name: W3Schools Dark Sublime (Fixed)
description: This is an updated version of W3Schools Dark Sublime style. Fixed the search popup, updated the page link to apply, themed some missing panels, the "try it" examples, and some buttons. Comment any missing element below and I'll try to fix it.
additional_info:
v1.4.5 - 01/12/2020
--------------------------
Fixed red warning banners.

v1.4.4 - 19/06/2020
--------------------------
Themed missing white buttons.

v1.4.3 - 02/03/2020
--------------------------
Fixed sidebar active links.

v1.4.2 - 08/02/2020
--------------------------
Minor fix for the browser compatibility table headers.

v1.4.1 - 17/11/2019
--------------------------
Minor fix for some default letter colors in content boxes.

v1.4.0 - 15/11/2019
--------------------------
Colored some parts of the how-to section, some missing white borders, and tables.

v1.3.0 - 04/11/2019
--------------------------
Initial Release
